original_title: An Officer & A Gentleman: John Silver
overview: Sit back grab a cold beverage of your choosing... rip into that Lunchable and enjoy this episode of "An Officer and A Gentleman" with none other than John Silver! Get ready to look at some B-hole and walk alone with Batista. You may even get a boner from Nicole Bass. Enjoy John Silver, Chuck Taylor, and Dan Barry as they talk about whatever they want.
title: An Officer & A Gentleman: John Silver
